function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"33% of works do not identify pandemic disruptions","Impact":"Incomplete understanding of pandemic impact on operations","Mitigation":"Require explicit identification of pandemic disruptions in research works","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Researchers, academicians","Owner":"Research institutions, academic journals"},{"Description":"Supply chain disruptions impact company results","Impact":"Negative effect on company results","Mitigation":"Implement supply chain risk management strategy, cooperation between stakeholders, and investment in infrastructure, equipment, and human capital","Technologies":"Supply chain management systems, data analytics, communication tools","People":"Companies, suppliers, customers","Owner":"Company management, supply chain managers"},{"Description":"Challenging implementation of supply chain risk management strategy","Impact":"Difficulty in managing supply chain risks effectively","Mitigation":"Focus on cooperation between company, tier-1 and tier-2 suppliers, and customers, accumulation of accurate knowledge of supply chain, and investment in infrastructure, equipment, and training","Technologies":"Supply chain management systems, data analytics, communication tools","People":"Supply chain managers, company management","Owner":"Supply chain managers, company management"}]}
